cosmos.question: I'm big and bright and come out at night. I twinkle high, what am I?

hints.text: ✨ I have many, many friends in the sky.
🌃 You can only see me when it's dark.
🌟 I shine very far away

cosmos.question: I'm big and round and give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I'm very, very hot.
🌞 I help plants grow.
🌕 I disappear at night.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, but I'm not an airplane. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Sometimes I'm a circle, sometimes a sliver.
🐺 Werewolves howl at me.
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that shines very brightly, like our sun, but far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 I am very far from Earth.
🌌 I make my own light
✨ There are many of me in the sky.

cosmos.question: I am big and round and spin around the Sun. You live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 It's your home.
💧I have lots of water.
🌎 People live on me

cosmos.question: I am a shape you can see in the night sky made up of stars. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One is called the Big Bear
✨ Made of many stars
💫 It is not one star alone.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky or metallic object that orbits the Sun, smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am not a star or planet
🌑 I’m smaller than the Earth.
✨ Many of us live in a belt.

cosmos.question: I am a planet, known as the 'Red Planet'. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me!
🔴 My color comes from rust.
👽 Some people think aliens live here.

cosmos.question: I am very far away. Light takes many years to reach us from me, a group of many stars. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I'm like a huge city of stars.
🌀 I can be spiral-shaped.
🚀 Our sun is part of me.

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of ice and dust that flies around the Sun and has a tail when I get close! What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am a 'dirty snowball'.
🧊 I’m mostly frozen.
✨ You can sometimes see me from Earth with a telescope.

bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often red.
🍃 I live in the garden
⚫ I have lots of little dots.

bug.question: I make honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like to visit flowers.
🐝 I make a buzzing sound.
🍯 People like to eat what I make.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry food. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony
🪨 I am very small.
🧺 I can carry things much bigger than me.

bug.question: I flap my colorful wings and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I start as a caterpillar.
🌷 I love to land on flowers.
🎨 I have pretty patterns.

bug.question: I hop and jump in the grass and make a 'Chirp Chirp' sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often green.
🌱 I eat plants.
🤸 I am very good at jumping.

bug.question: I build webs to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of sticky threads.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🪰 I catch flying insects.

bug.question: I can light up the night sky with my glow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 My light comes from my body.
🌙 I am most visible at night.
✨ I am often found in forests.

bug.question: I make a loud noise in the summer by rubbing my wings together. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ You often hear me on hot days.
🎶 My sound is like a buzzing or chirping.
🌳 I live in trees.

bug.question: I dig in the ground and make little hills. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I am not a worm, but I live underground.
🐜 I work together with my family.
⛰️ You can see my home in the yard made of dirt

bug.question: I eat wood, and I live in groups inside of it. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I can cause damage to houses.
🪵 I eat and live in trees as well.
🐜 People might mistake me for ants.
